item.title: Walls
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Furkan Mod Furkan
item.description:
@Mod_Furkan wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:8, topic:179313”][quote author=kc pure 816 link=topic=240461.msg2037773#msg2037773 date=1202434087]
man i hate varrock sources they all suck they all the same u should use dff srouce
[/quote]

You are apparently new to this site, old school servers are based around varrock, but mines is only spawn once and that’s all.

I agree with Mod Adam, it’s better doing it client sided because of the lag it takes since its loading the objects because of the cache, then having to delete it(not from cache) and keep deleting it, since it uses the cache’s objects.

Oh and it’s probably high detail, thats why it is like that.[/quote]

I really don’t give a shit if it’s in varrock or not but thanks for telling me about the lag problem part.

Read full topic

item.title: Walls
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

kc pure 816:

man i hate varrock sources they all suck they all the same u should use dff srouce

You are apparently new to this site, old school servers are based around varrock, but mines is only spawn once and that’s all.

I agree with Mod Adam, it’s better doing it client sided because of the lag it takes since its loading the objects because of the cache, then having to delete it(not from cache) and keep deleting it, since it uses the cache’s objects.

Oh and it’s probably high detail, thats why it is like that.

[quote=“kc pure 816, post:6, topic:179313”][quote author=Mod Furkan link=topic=240461.msg2037783#msg2037783 date=1202434247]

man i hate varock sources they all suck they all the same u should use dff srouce
